title: Find Maximum Elements From List
description: In Python, there are many ways to manipulate lists. One common task is to find the n maximum elements from a list. In this challenge, you will be asked to write a function that returns the n maximum elements from a list.

meta.title: Python List Manipulation | N Maximum Elements
meta.description: Learn how to find the n maximum elements from a list in Python. Explore efficient list manipulation techniques with this programming tutorial.
meta.keywords: Python, list manipulation, maximum elements, programming tutorial, coding challenge
